entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
